name: CharEditLite - Recompiled - 1.0.0
description:
[h1] This is not my mod [/h1]
This mod was done by Mechani aka Legion, https://github.com/Mechani-Legion/ and kindly put on github.

As he is no longer maintaining it, I will maintain this one for as long as I play CE. I recompiled this because the 6.8.4 version on the workshop is compiled with a really old verison PersistentHumanoidNPC saved on the authors computer in the mods Content folder. This is causes a lot of log spam and wierd skeleton / animation side effects. 


[h1] Original Notes [/h1]
A little mod for saving, loading or editing the appearance of the characters and thralls (for solo/coop and server).
Info: v6.8.4
- The mod is triggered by an item named "Mirror". Crafted at Artisan's Worktable.
- The mirror gives a code or can create an item named "Shard" for the management of appearances.
- Full editor, HD preview. Customisation rights management (admin).
- Good compatibility with others mods. Automatic addition of some customisation features.
changeNote: Recompiled mod as it was saved with an old version of PersistentHumanoidNPC in the local content folder on the authors computer. This is just a clean compile
author: Teella
